item.title: Damaged fence along watercourse, 3rd November
item.description:
The wooden fence on both sides of Millbridge Road on Porchester Road is badly deteriorated and likely to break if anyone leans on it. Plase replace it with something more likely to last longer than wood, or ensure the wood is regularly treated to prevent it rotting.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Porchester Road, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Morrisons Shopping trolley, 3rd November
item.description:
Left by bridge. I moved it away to avoid idiots throwing it in the stream, but it will be good to grab it quickly if possible. Morrisons. Thanks for picking this up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Bibury Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: When entering the chicane travelling towards Cleeve visibility is blocked by a small growth of vegetation. This means drivers can enter the chicane and then be faced by an oncoming car travelling towards Gotherington. This is dangerous., 3rd November
item.description:
The vegetation hindering visibility is halfway along the chicane, on the western side of the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gotherington Lane, Gotherington, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road closed sign and barriers been lying here for several months and need removing., 3rd November
item.description:
The verges on the whole length of Gotherington Lane contain signage of road closed and flood and have been left there for a couple of months. They should be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cleeve Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged/sunken man-hole cover., 2nd November
item.description:
There are two man-hole covers in front of No.26 Hales road at junction with Rosehill Street. One was repaired about a year ago, but the other one is now sunken, damaged and rattling as cars, lorries and buses go over it - this has only happened in the last couple of weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Hales Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
